name: Google Material
description: Material Google Search Results, based on the concept design by Aurélien Salomon
additional_info: NOTE: Requires Roboto font to be installed to look its best, but is fully functional with default sans-serif fonts. You can get the Roboto font from here: http://developer.android.com/design/style/typography.html Version History 2.5 - (20 Nov 2018) - Fixed text offset in search boxes and dropdown 2.4 - (2 Oct 2018) - Fixed text being cut off in presenter boxes 2.3 - (29 Jul 2018) - Fixed layout again - Minor alignment updates 2.2 - Fixed layout again - Set minimum width for page, resizing the browser window should no longer break the page - Fixed search bar and knowledge panel drop-shadow - Many minor fixes 2.1 - Fixed layout due to Google changes again, styled more parts of the search results including the footer and navbar. 2.0 - Rewrote the style completely because Google changed it's layout - again. - Supports Chrome properly as well as Firefox. 1.2 - Fixed issues caused by Google changing it's website layout. 1.1 - Fixed Result Stats location overlapping UI elements when signed into google. - Fixed Search Tools display becoming too large on mouseover. 1.0 - Initial Release

discussions.name: hide some part of the contents
looks fine but has a bit of overlap issues..
needs darker color for link titles and also a different color when link has been already opened
